snippet.title: Sniper Elite 4 - Target: Führer Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy at Amazon (UK) - PS4/Xbox One: https://amzn.to/2ICjGa4 
Buy at Amazon (USA) – PS4: https://amzn.to/39HDMvr

Watch this intriguing Target: Führer reveal trailer for a tease of just some of the DOZENS of ways you can take down Hitler in the expansive pre-order content for Sniper Elite 4! 

Featuring a thrilling mission for 1-2 players across a huge coastal U-boat facility packed with Nazi troops and an array of gratifyingly hazardous environments, players will get a fantastic taster of Sniper Elite 4’s open-ended tactical action, rewarding not only their sharpshooting skills but also their wit and creativity. 

Follow us on:
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Mixer: https://mixer.com/rebellion_official 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/sniperelitegame/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/SniperElite  
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/

#Rebellion #SniperElite4 #TargetFührer
